title: West Buffalo Hill
text: West Buffalo Hill () or Wong Ngau Shan () is a 604-metre high hill within <a href="Ma%20On%20Shan%20Country%20Park">Ma On Shan Country Park</a>, <a href="New%20Territories">New Territories</a>, <a href="Hong%20Kong">Hong Kong</a>. It lies directly west of <a href="Buffalo%20Hill%20%28Hong%20Kong%29">Buffalo Hill</a>, thus receiving its name. Stage 4 of the <a href="MacLehose%20Trail">MacLehose Trail</a> passes through the hill.
